Palm_Beach_Gardens.Christ Fellowship:
Christ Fellowship is a multi-site, multi-ethnic, megachurch based in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida with more than 26,000 in attendance each week on eight campuses throughout South Florida.
Christ Fellowship started in 1984 as a small Bible study with 40 people in Dr. Tom and Donna Mullins' living room and has grown to nearly 26,000 people on multiple regional campuses in South Florida.
